conclusion: The well has a depth of 8 meters, the wellhead radius is 0.5 meters, the refractive index of water is n = 4/3, and the frog wants to float along the right top of the well to have a panoramic view of all the scenery outside the well.
When light enters a medium with a higher refractive index, it bends towards the normal; when it enters a medium with a lower refractive index, it bends away from the normal.
The frog is at the center of the bottom of the well and wants to float along the right top of the well.
The frog needs to float to the right top of the well.
